description:
A lone planet hangs in the universe. This colorful planet of blue skies, white clouds, and green earth is where Bananya spends his leisurely days. One day, Baby Sweet suddenly appears before Bananya. The two quickly become friends and set out on a wondrous journey.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: ばなにゃとのそうぐう, にゃ!
